name: Call of an Etude
description:
Turn the chains of your oppressors against them in this Metroid/Castlevania inspired platformer. Fight through the levels of the factory to disassemble the machine until you reach the agent behind it all.

Created for the 9th Metroidvania Jam.

Controls:
* Move - Arrow keys or WASD
* Space - Jump
* E - Attack
* Q - Ability (unlocked during demo)

Full controller support.

This game in a demo, and missing levels and content from the full game.
Planned features:
* 4 more bosses + a final boss
* Rocket launcher and destructible rooms
* Map / Minimap

Can you find the adventurous achievement?
